description: Application for Minor Material Amendments (s73) to vary planning condition 2 of planning permission reference 171489FUL dated 08/09/2017 for "conversion of loft space into 1 additional self contained residential unit (1x2 bed) for a total of 4 self contained units in the building; with associated cycle parking and refuse storage (double mansard roof approved under appeal ref: APP/A5270/W/16/3164460)" Application seeking to replace approved dormer windows with rooflights, installation of two skylights at third floor level and removal of existing parapet & chimney
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: 251_2BG_X000, 251_2BG_X001, 251_2BG_X002, 251_2BG_X003, 251_2BG_X004, 251_2BG_D101, 251_2BG_D102, 251_2BG_D103, 251_2BG_D104, 251_2BG_D105, 251_2BG_D106, 251_2BG_D107, 251_2BG_D108, 251_2BG_D109 (received 24/09/2018)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Ealing Adopted Development Management DPD (2012) policies 7.4 and 7B; London Plan (2016) policies 7.4 and 7.6; and National Planning Policy Framework (2018) | Prior to first occupation, the refuse and recycling storage areas as shown on plan no. 251_2BG_D101 shall be implemented and shall be retained thereafter.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of occupiers of the area and in the interests of the future occupants of the development in accordance with policies with policies 3.5 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan 2013, policies 1.1 (e) of the Adopted Ealing Development (Core) Strategy and The London Plan (2016) policy 5.16. | Prior to first occupation, storage for cycle parking facilities for 3 cycles shall be implemented in the location shown on approved plan no. 251_2BG_D101 and shall be retained thereafter.
Reason: To provide adequate bicycle storage to align with adopted Sustainable Transport SPG and policy 6.9 of the London Plan Consolidated (2016).
